is a traditional province in western
. Estrmadura does not have administrative status. Currently, the northern section is considered part of the central region. The southern section is now part of the Lisbon region.

Caldas da Rainha, Torres Vedras (both cities)
Mafra, Sesimbra, Cascais, Palmela (towns)
It is in western Portugal[not to be confused with Extremadura[Spain].
Trains,rent a car,buses,ferry boats to/from Lisbon-Cacilhas(Almada).

Generally safe,some parts of Lisbon (Cais do Sodre,Bairro Alto,train stations) especially @ nite; some dicotheques should be avoided; have mediocre security or none. Do not go to the parks @ nite; take a taxi if needed.
Some hotels, pousadas, inns, pensoes are nice.

Tejo valley:Abrantes,Almourol,Tomar(recomemded;Tomar is a beautiful small,but monumental city), Santarem;Troia peninsula,across from Setubal. There is not much to see/do in Setubal city except taking the ferry to Tria (be careful in some Lisbon suburbs & Setubal city).
